translation.en: [man] Hey, tell Marie I'm on my way. I'm headed to the hospital now.
translation.es: Dile a Marie que ya voy camino al hospital.

translation.en: And tell her I love her.
And everything's gonna be okay.
translation.es: Y que todo va a estar bien.

translation.en: Hey, call me when you get this and let me know what's going on.
translation.es: Llámame cuando escuches esto y dime qué pasa.

translation.en: -Marie? -Nah, it's DiAngelo.
-You talk to her yet? -I can't get through to her.
Her cousin Teresa isn't picking up either.
She's gonna pull through, man. The baby, too.
translation.es: Estará bien. Y el bebé también.

translation.en: Yeah. They will.
Hey, look, I gotta go, I gotta try her again.
translation.es: Te corto. Voy a intentar de nuevo.

translation.en: I'll catch up with you later.
Yeah, I'll catch you later, man. Call me back when you hear some--
translation.es: Sí, hablamos luego. Llámame cuando sepas...

translation.en: You okay, Pete?
What happened?
He came out of nowhere.
[officer] DiAngelo.
What condition's he in? Male, female, what?
I don't know.
What the fuck you do, Jablonski?
[officer] Who's over there, Di?
Stay on the fucking road.
Put it in the trunk.
You talk to your wife yet?
How's she doing?
What the fuck are you talking about?
No one saw you, right?
Yo, Di!
This is what's gonna happen.
You're gonna leave right now. Go.
translation.es: Tú te vas ya mismo. Vete.

translation.en: -[officer] Di, what the fuck? -Shut up!
-No, we got to call it in. -He's dead.
translation.es: - No, tenemos que reportarlo. - Está muerto.

translation.en: There's nothing you can do for him.
translation.es: No puedes hacer nada por él.

translation.en: Did you go over there?
Did you see what's in that ditch?
They're gonna crucify you for this.
translation.es: Te van a crucificar por esto.

translation.en: Every one of us is gonna pay for this. You understand what I'm saying, right?
No one's gonna find him here, okay?
No one's gotta know.
Hey. Hey.
I said I got this.
Get to the hospital. Go be with your wife.
translation.es: Ve al hospital con tu esposa.

translation.en: Drive away.
[DiAngelo] Get it out of the road.
Where do you want me to put it?
-[Marie] Yeah. -What are you doing to her?
Oh, Pete.
It's okay. Don't look so worried. It's just a little spotting.
translation.es: Tranquilo, deja esa cara. Solo fue un poco de sangre.

translation.en: Did you see Teresa? She was-- She just walked out.
Dr. Taranaweh ran an ultrasound. I can pull it up for you if you want.
translation.es: El Dr. Taranaweh hizo una ecografía. Puede verla si quiere.

translation.en: No, why don't you get the fucking doctor?
translation.es: No, ¿por qué no llama al puto médico?

translation.en: Yeah. Sure.
Seriously, Petey?
That was rude.
No, you said you were bleeding.
It stopped.
Okay?
-You-- -It's fine. I promise.
Hey, come here. Come here.
We're past the five month mark, Pete.
translation.es: Ya pasé el quinto mes, Pete.

translation.en: I have a good feeling, you know?
Yeah, I know. No, it's just...
translation.es: Sí, lo sé. Es solo que...

translation.en: -You just scared me there. -I know. I know.
What happened?
It was nothing. No, we just...
-We were working. -[nurse] Doc will be here in a minute.
[nurse] It'll turn itself off.
Babe.
There he is.
Little Poke.
-[woman] Don't lose anymore, all right? -[school bell rings]
Those things are expensive. Last pair. All right.
translation.es: Son lentes caros. Que sea el último par. Bien.

translation.en: Excuse me.
-You waiting for somebody? -Yeah, my brother.
He's supposed to be here.
What grade is he in?
Sixth.
No, sixth graders, they left already, so that means he left too.
translation.es: Los de sexto ya se fueron. Se habrá ido él también.

translation.en: -Is there somebody you want to call? -Yeah, I just did. My mom.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres llamar a alguien? - Ya llamé a mi mamá.

translation.en: Maybe your brother walked home?
He didn't.
He takes his bike to school.
[woman] What your brother would be doing down here is beyond me.
translation.es: No sé qué puede estar haciendo aquí tu hermano.

translation.en: He's not here. He's at the park.
translation.es: No está aquí. Está en el parque.

translation.en: [woman] Do you see him?
Where else do you think he could be?
I don't know.
Ryan!
What the fuck?
Little shit.
-[door shuts] -Fuck off.
[Ryan] I, uh...
kind of sat on this. Sorry.
It's okay.
What is that?
[woman] It's a seagull.
My son Brenton made it.
[girl] Wow. It's cool.
Put on your seat belts. If we hurry up, we can get you home
translation.es: Pónganse el cinturón. Si vamos rápido, estarán en casa

translation.en: before it really starts kicking up.
translation.es: antes de que nieve en serio.

translation.en: [bartender] Ready for another?
Yeah.
-I got tied up on the turnpike. So sorry. -[clerk] All rise.
translation.es: Había un atasco. - Lo siento mucho. - Todos de pie.

translation.en: Superior court of Hudson County, state of New Jersey, is now in session,
translation.es: El tribunal superior de Hudson, Nueva Jersey, entra en sesión.

translation.en: Honorable Richard Blatt presiding.
Please sit.
Your Honor, the State presents complaint number...
translation.es: Señoría, el Estado presenta la demanda número...

translation.en: Uh, it's... Got it. Uh, it's...
complaint number 5977.
This is the defendant's third shoplifting charge.
translation.es: Es la tercera imputación de hurto de la acusada.

translation.en: Ms. Lufts stole $200 in cat food.
translation.es: La señora Lufts robó 200 dólares en comida para gato.

translation.en: You've got the wrong defendant.
That's not the complaint number I'm looking at, Counselor.
translation.es: No es el número de demanda que tengo yo, abogada.

translation.en: Get your paperwork in order before you walk into my courtroom.
translation.es: Ordene sus papeles antes de venir a mi tribunal.

translation.en: -Your Honor, I have it right here. It-- -[judge] Next.
[man] Our county is the gold standard in law enforcement.
translation.es: Nuestro condado es un ejemplo de orden público.

translation.en: Working hand in hand with its citizens.
The police violence we're witnessing
translation.es: La violencia policial que vemos contra negros y morenos

translation.en: in black and brown communities throughout America
translation.es: La violencia policial que vemos contra negros y morenos en todo el país no tiene lugar en Nueva Jersey.

translation.en: has no place in New Jersey.
translation.es: en todo el país no tiene lugar en Nueva Jersey.

translation.en: As prosecutor, good police and community relations
translation.es: Como fiscal, siempre cuidé la buena relación

translation.en: have been a priority in my administration.
[reporter] Mr. Connelly, when are you announcing your run for governor?
[man] Darius!
Darius!
[woman] He was a little off-beat though.
-Gotta tell you. -[man] No.
I saw Brother Jerrel and you saw Brother Jerrel too.
translation.es: Yo vi al hermano Jerrel y tú también.

translation.en: And who he was looking at.
-[man chuckling] -Oh, you are crazy!
'Saiah, you know that woman is married.
I know, I'm just saying she looked good after she lost all that weight.
translation.es: Solo digo que se ve bien ahora que adelgazó.

translation.en: Brenton? Baby, you home?
Brenton! Your mama's calling you, boy!
He should be here by now. Or did he forget about tonight too?
translation.es: Debería estar aquí. ¿También se le olvidó esto?

translation.en: No, Uncle Seth's coming home, and that's all he could talk about.
translation.es: No, viene el tío Seth y no habla de otra cosa.

translation.en: He is so excited. He's got a surprise for the both of you.
translation.es: Cómo se entusiasma. Tiene una sorpresa para los dos.

translation.en: What? That he forgot his uncle's homecoming?
Aw, come on, he's either in the yard or upstairs in his room. I'll check.
translation.es: Ya basta. Estará en el patio o en su cuarto. Voy a ver.

translation.en: I see he's been messing with my TV again.
translation.es: Otra vez hizo cambios en mi televisor.

translation.en: I can't turn it on if he's done playing with his damn video games.
translation.es: No anda cuando usa esos malditos videojuegos.

translation.en: Well, maybe you should leave it off seeing as you got a whole house to paint.
translation.es: Mejor no lo enciendas. Debes pintar toda la casa.

translation.en: [automated voice] You have one new message.
Brenton!
[man] Yeah, we're looking for the parents of Brenton Butler.
translation.es: Buscamos a los padres de Brenton Butler.

translation.en: Could you call the South District police station when you get the message?
translation.es: Por favor, llamen a la comisaría del distrito sur.

translation.en: It concerns your son.
I heard the callout.
[officer] Found him with a BMX bike that's pretty banged up.
translation.es: Solo hay una BMX muy golpeada.

translation.en: [detective] Got any ID on the kid?
Brenton Butler. Black male, 15 years old.
Notified the parents. He's at the ER at Jersey City Medical Center in surgery.
translation.es: Notificamos a los padres. Lo están operando de emergencia.

translation.en: [detective] Anyone have a conversation with the parents?
[officer] Wanted to wait for you.
-He's alive? -[officer 2] Yeah.
He's probably fucking brain dead. It's like the Red Sea down there.
translation.es: Seguro con muerte cerebral. Hay mucha sangre.

translation.en: -Hey. I'm sorry, brother. Um... -You gotta wait.
I'm sorry. It's my son. He's been in a car accident.
translation.es: Perdón, es por mi hijo. Tuvo un accidente.

translation.en: You got to wait in line.
We're sorry, we don't know what's going on with our son. Please?
translation.es: Perdón, no sabemos de nuestro hijo. Por favor.

translation.en: -Thank you, thank you, thank you. -His name is Brenton. Brenton Butler.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Se llama Brenton. Brenton Butler.

translation.en: [receptionist] There's no "r." It's "Benton."
Gave me the wrong spelling. I'll need you to fill this out.
translation.es: Me lo dijeron mal. Completen esto.

translation.en: -Do you have your insurance card, ID? -[woman] Yeah.
Have a seat, the doctor will talk to you when he's done in surgery.
translation.es: La doctora los verá al salir de cirugía.

translation.en: Surgery?
Just have a seat. The doctor will talk to you when he's done.
translation.es: Siéntense. Luego los verá la doctora.

translation.en: -Why would he be in surgery? -I don't know.
They don't tell us these things.
Please, just have a seat.
Surgery?
Father God, praise be to you.
Your glory, your mercy.
Watch over our baby.
Please don't let my baby die, Father God. I don't know...
translation.es: Por favor, no lo dejes morir, Dios Padre. No sé...

translation.en: I ask this in your holy name.
translation.es: Te lo pido en tu santo nombre.

translation.en: Please, Father God. Look after my...
translation.es: Por favor, Dios Padre, cuida a mi...

translation.en: Fuck. [breath trembling]
You're fine, you're fine, you're fine. -You're fine. -[windshield wipers scraping]
I'd been sleeping in my car under the Pulaski the whole day.
translation.es: Estuve todo el día durmiendo en mi auto bajo el puente Pulaski.

translation.en: Nobody bothers me there,
except when that cop came banging on my window.
translation.es: salvo el policía que me golpeó la ventanilla.

translation.en: Did you drive through the park this morning?
No, I-- I told you I was sleeping under the Pulaski all day.
translation.es: No. Ya le dije que me pasé todo el día durmiendo bajo el puente Pulaski.

translation.en: [man] Drinking too, right? -All the live long day. -[knocking, door opens]
translation.es: Y bebiendo, ¿verdad? Todo el santo día.

translation.en: You the on-call AP?
Yeah, I'm KJ Harper. They just put me back on an hour ago.
translation.es: Sí, KJ Harper. Acaban de asignarme hace una hora.

translation.en: Right. One of my CIs tipped us off to this guy.
translation.es: Uno de mis informantes mencionó a este.

translation.en: Saw Gramps here cleaning blood off the front of his car
translation.es: Lo vio en la mañana lavando su auto manchado de sangre

translation.en: near the park this morning.
We just picked him up riding around near there,
two sheets to the wind.
Why's narcotics interested in a hit-and-run?
We just got a tip.
-Hmm. -And he looks good for it.
Two prior DUIs, it's a matter of time before he killed someone.
translation.es: Dos arrestos por conducir ebrio. Era cuestión de tiempo.

translation.en: That's in the report. You read that, right?
translation.es: Lo dice el informe. Lo leíste, ¿no?

translation.en: Of course I did.
I just didn't realize reports were read by every Joe in the district.
translation.es: Solo que no sabía que los leía cualquiera.

translation.en: [chuckles] Every...
I've seen you before, down at the courthouse.
translation.es: Te he visto, en el tribunal.

translation.en: You work the shoplifting cases.
translation.es: Te asignan los casos de hurtos.

translation.en: You got this tied up with a bow.
translation.es: Tienes esto en bandeja de plata.

translation.en: You got enough for a plea without lifting one bejeweled nail.
translation.es: Lo condenarán sin que muevas un solo dedo.

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzing] -I know how to do my job, but thanks.
translation.es: Sé hacer mi trabajo, pero gracias.

translation.en: Well, then do it.
Mr. Dorsey seems to believe he was asleep in his car.
translation.es: El Sr. Dorsey parece creer que dormía en su auto.

translation.en: Well, what's he gonna say?
"Oh, I just rolled over some kid's head in my Buick, my bad"?
translation.es: ¿"Le aplasté la cabeza a un niño con la Buick, mil disculpas"?

translation.en: [DiAngelo laughing] Come on.
Okay. Thanks.
Hey.
The trash can's down there.
This fucking guy. It's your boy, Jablonski.
He keeps calling.
[Dorsey] I didn't kill no kid. I was sleeping.
translation.es: No maté a ningún chico. Estaba durmiendo.

translation.en: [detective] Yo! Ms. Harper!
Yo! Hey!
Are you the assistant prosecutor on my job?
translation.es: ¿Eres la fiscal asistente en mi caso?

translation.en: I'm Joe Rinaldi. You can call me Fish. Uh, former NYPD,
translation.es: Joe Rinaldi. Llámame Fish. Ex Policía de Nueva York.

translation.en: but I just got this new place out on the water. It's fucking beautiful.
translation.es: Pero encontré un sitio en la costa. Es precioso.

translation.en: The kids love it, so I figured, fuck it, why not Jersey.
translation.es: Los niños lo aman, y pensé: "¿Por qué no Jersey?".

translation.en: -Did you need something from me? -Uh, yeah.
Yeah. The guys in there said that you're ready to file this job.
translation.es: Me dijeron que estás lista para presentar cargos.

translation.en: -You got enough for that? -Yep.
Yep. Okey-dokey. Um...
Yo, are you going to the hospital? I need to pick up the victim's belongings.
translation.es: Oye, ¿vas al hospital? Necesito las pertenencias de la víctima.

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, I am. -Mind if I ride with?
Sure. Yeah.
If we pass a bodega en route, think about picking up some mints.
translation.es: Puedes comprar pastillas de menta de camino.

translation.en: I'm just-- I don't care.
I'm just saying, out of respect for the family.
translation.es: Lo digo por respeto a la familia.

translation.en: I can smell you like a mile away. Not a good look.
translation.es: Se huele a un kilómetro. No queda bien.

translation.en: Actually, I have to go to the office for some paperwork, so...
translation.es: En realidad, debo ir a la oficina por unos papeles.

translation.en: Get your own ride there.
What'd they do to my boy? What'd they do to my boy?
translation.es: ¿Qué le hicieron a mi hijo? ¿Qué le hicieron?

translation.en: -[man] Be with you every step of the way. -[Seth] It's all good, bro.
translation.es: Está todo bien, hermano. Sé fuerte.

translation.en: It's all right.
Oh, Latrice.
[Seth] It's gonna be all right. It's gonna be all right.
Brenton, he was counting the days to see you in uniform.
translation.es: Brenton estaba contando los días para verte de uniforme.

translation.en: It's been a while. He's so proud.
translation.es: Fue mucho tiempo. Está muy orgulloso.

translation.en: And he wants to hear all the stories about Afghanistan and Kandastan.
translation.es: Y quiere que le cuentes todo de Afganistán y Kandastán.

translation.en: Are you the parents of Brenton Butler?
-Uh, yeah. -He's stable.
I was able to relieve the pressure on his brain,
translation.es: Pude aliviar la presión sobre el cerebro...

translation.en: but there's been significant impact,
primarily to the posterior cortex, the back of his head.
translation.es: sobre todo en la corteza posterior, atrás de su cabeza.

translation.en: What does that mean?
He could lose the ability to function independently.
translation.es: Quizá no vuelva a ser independiente.

translation.en: He could be on a ventilator for a long time.
translation.es: Y use un respirador por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: What happened? Was he at school?
-The police haven't told us. -[doctor] I don't know. I'm sorry.
translation.es: - La policía no nos ha dicho. - No lo sé.

translation.en: Uh, can we see him now?
Not everyone right now, just the parents.
translation.es: No todos, por ahora. Solo los padres.

translation.en: -You can come with me. -Okay.
-Where's DiAngelo at? -Come here.
Not picking up his phone. No one's picking up.
[Pete] Now what the fuck is going on?
DiAngelo would fucking lose his mind if he saw you here.
translation.es: DiAngelo se volverá loco si te ve aquí.

translation.en: We're taking care of it.
The kid's alive. Now that's what you call taking care of it? Huh?
translation.es: El chico está vivo, ¿a eso llaman ocuparse?

translation.en: You think we fucking knew that?
Look, all I'm saying is there's got to be another way.
translation.es: Solo digo que tiene que haber otra manera.

translation.en: This is wrong, and you know it is.
translation.es: Esto está mal y lo sabes.

translation.en: This whole thing's gonna blow up.
And we're all gonna go to prison for a fucking accident.
translation.es: Vamos a ir todos presos por un puto accidente.

translation.en: A white cop and a black kid?
Don't you watch the news?
There are no fucking accidents anymore, and you know it.
translation.es: Ya no existen accidentes, carajo. Y lo sabes.

translation.en: The assistant prosecutor's filing papers on a guy tonight. It's over.
translation.es: Presentarán cargos esta noche. Ya está.

translation.en: What guy?
Who cares, man? Not you.
Excuse me, I just started the Narcotics Unit here.
translation.es: Disculpa. Soy de la Unidad Narcóticos, soy nuevo.

translation.en: DiAngelo's team?
You know who's um... who's working the hit-and-run in the park?
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién se encarga del atropellado del parque?

translation.en: Another new guy, Rinaldi. He's out, left an hour ago.
translation.es: Otro nuevo, Rinaldi. Se fue hace una hora.

translation.en: -[Pete] Know when he's gonna be back? -I have no idea.
Do you want to leave a message?
What about the captain? You got his name?
You got a report, you can turn it in to your supervising officer.
translation.es: Si tienes un dato, dáselo a tu supervisor.

translation.en: I gotta talk to the captain. Direct.
translation.es: Debo hablar con el comisario. Directamente.

translation.en: I'll leave my cell, all right?
Just make sure he gets it.
Yep.
Got the kid's clothing. How about you?
Get all your personal business taken care of?
Pick up some milk? Go to the bank?
That's good. That's important.
[Fish] Mr. Butler? Mrs. Butler?
Who are you?
We're with the prosecutor's office. We're looking for the parents.
translation.es: Somos de la Fiscalía. Buscamos a los padres.

translation.en: Yes.
I'm Detective Rinaldi. This is KJ Harper.
[Isaiah] What happened to my son?
-They said he was in a car accident. -[Latrice] Yeah.
translation.es: Solo dijeron que fue un accidente.

translation.en: No one's talked to us. The police haven't said anything.
translation.es: Nadie nos ha hablado. La policía no dice nada.

translation.en: [Fish] Uh, we need some privacy right now to talk. Please.
translation.es: Necesitamos privacidad para hablar. Por favor.

translation.en: Joseph, can you give us a minute?
There's a waiting room at the end of the hall.
translation.es: Hay una sala de espera al fondo.

translation.en: There'll be a bail hearing tomorrow before the arraignment at the courthouse.
translation.es: Mañana habrá una audiencia antes de la comparecencia...

translation.en: [Seth] That's not what they asked.
We need to know exactly how this happened.
Your son was in a hit-and-run this morning at Liberty State Park.
translation.es: Fue esta mañana en el parque Liberty.

translation.en: [Isaiah] This morning?
They didn't call us until a few hours ago.
That's when they found him, earlier tonight.
Two people found him. Their dog, actually.
translation.es: Dos personas. Su perro, en realidad.

translation.en: [KJ] We have the man in custody who we believe did this.
translation.es: Tenemos bajo custodia al que creemos culpable.

translation.en: I'll be filing paperwork with the judge tonight
translation.es: Hoy mismo presentaré los papeles al juez

translation.en: for his hearing first thing tomorrow.
Can you be a little more clear with the details? I...
[KJ] Oh... Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
[Fish] It's a nice bike your son's got. Five Kings rides them too.
translation.es: Su hijo tiene una linda bicicleta. Como las de los Cinco Reyes.

translation.en: That series of BMX goes for some serious bank.
What are you implying?
That Brenton's with a gang? Really? You gonna do this now?
translation.es: ¿Que Brenton es de una pandilla? ¿En serio?

translation.en: Wanna step back, whoever you are, and let me talk to the family?
translation.es: Sea quien sea, ¿me deja hablar con la familia?

translation.en: I am family, and I don't appreciate you coming up in here
translation.es: Yo soy su familia y no me gusta que venga

translation.en: -and accusing my nephew-- -[Isaiah] Seth, let me handle this.
translation.es: - y acuse a mi sobrino... - Seth, yo me encargo.

translation.en: We bought the bike.
Brenton's 16th birthday's coming up soon.
Now, what's gonna happen to the man who did this?
translation.es: ¿Qué será del hombre que le hizo esto?

translation.en: Well, I'll be charging Mr. Dorsey
translation.es: Voy a acusar al Sr. Dorsey

translation.en: with leaving the scene of a motor vehicle accident
translation.es: de abandonar la escena de un accidente

translation.en: resulting in serious bodily injury.
And I'll suggest the maximum sentence for this type of felony.
translation.es: Y voy a recomendar la condena máxima.

translation.en: Which is what, exactly?
Three to five years.
My son laid in the cold...
translation.es: Mi hijo estuvo tirado en el frío...

translation.en: in the snow, in pain...
for hours.
And no one came for him except a dog.
translation.es: Y nadie fue a buscarlo, salvo un perro.

translation.en: He may never walk again.
He may never wake up again.
And you're telling me that the person that did this
translation.es: ¿Y usted me dice que el que le hizo esto

translation.en: will get three to five years?
translation.es: irá a la cárcel de tres a cinco años?

translation.en: That man deserves to die for what he did to my son!
translation.es: ¡Ese hombre merece morir por lo que le hizo a mi hijo!

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Fish] My card.
-[KJ sighs] Damn it. -[alarm chirps]
You're locking yourself out doing it like that. Just click it once.
translation.es: Así lo trabas. Presiona una sola vez.

translation.en: I don't need to be told how to unlock my damn car.
translation.es: No necesito que me enseñen a abrir mi auto.

translation.en: Okay.
What? Come on. Harper!
-[Fish] Come on! -[knocking]
-[starts engine] -But we gotta go to impound.
We gotta get the paperwork on Dorsey's car.
translation.es: ¡Hacer el papeleo del auto de Dorsey!

translation.en: -[Fish] Harper, please. -[knocking]
Harper, look. Look.
This is you when the night's done and you don't have to see me anymore.
translation.es: Esta eres tú cuando termine la noche y no tengas que verme más.

translation.en: [Fish] Thank you.
[pastor] Today we claim promises over our son Brenton.
translation.es: Hoy reclamamos las promesas hechas a nuestro hijo Brenton.

translation.en: We believe in the healing power of faith and prayer
translation.es: Creemos en el poder sanador de la fe y la oración

translation.en: and ask you to begin your mighty work in the life of Brenton.
translation.es: y te pedimos que comiences tu todopoderosa labor por su vida.

translation.en: Lord, your word speaks promises of healing and restoration.
translation.es: Señor, tu palabra hace promesas de sanación y restauración.

translation.en: And we thank you for the miracles you still perform today.
translation.es: Y te agradecemos los milagros que aún sigues haciendo.

translation.en: Is he gonna live?
What?
[Pete] I'm sorry. I was in the wrong room.
translation.es: Lo siento. Me equivoqué de habitación.

translation.en: I'm gonna turn myself in.
But nobody's gotta know none of you were there.
translation.es: Nadie sabrá que ustedes estuvieron ahí.

translation.en: Just to be clear...
this is what's gonna happen.
Well, they are gonna fuck you...
for Ferguson...
Chicago, Baltimore...
for every white cop who ever killed a black kid.
translation.es: ...por cada policía blanco que mató a un chico negro.

translation.en: -It was an accident. -No one gives a shit.
translation.es: - Fue un accidente. - A nadie le importa.

translation.en: So, before you do anything,
I want you to think about what kind of father you'd be behind bars...
translation.es: piensa en qué clase de padre serás para tu hijo...

translation.en: out of your son's life.
He ain't ever gonna know you.
You're a good cop, I see it. That's why I picked you.
translation.es: Eres buen policía, me doy cuenta. Por eso te elegí.

translation.en: You and me? We're a dying breed.
translation.es: Tú y yo somos una especie en extinción.

translation.en: And we take care of our own, you understand?
[DiAngelo] Don't go behind my back again.
translation.es: No vuelvas a actuar a mis espaldas.

translation.en: [Fish] I need the paperwork on my hit-and-run.
It's Mac Dorsey's car.
translation.es: Es el auto de Mac Dorsey.

translation.en: Who's the owner of the car? We need a signature.
[Fish] I told you, Mac Dorsey.
[Fish] Hey!
They need your John Hancock!
You want to wait inside?
It'll take about half an hour to release the paperwork on the vehicle.
translation.es: Llevará una media hora entregar los papeles.

translation.en: [KJ] I'll wait in the car.
Why? It's just a sign off.
[man] My supervisor's on break.
It's two in the fucking morning, what's he doing?
translation.es: Son las 2 de la mañana. ¿Adónde fue?

translation.en: [man] It's out of my hands. You can wait inside--
translation.es: No depende de mí. Pueden esperar...

translation.en: -[cell phone buzzes] -Rather freeze my balls off. Thanks.
[Fish] Hey.
Well, you gotta use the tape on the diaper, I told you that.
translation.es: Ponle cinta al pañal, ya te dije.

translation.en: Or he's gonna be dropping shit bombs all over the place.
translation.es: O dejará mierda por todos lados.

translation.en: Well, use your head.
How's Lizzie doing? Give her the hamburger yet?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal Lizzie? ¿Viste la hamburguesa que le dejé?

translation.en: What do you mean what about them? They've been depressed all week.
[Fish] You gonna hit that?
Because there's a cream.
[KJ] What?
I'm telling you, hobo herpes, it's a thing. I swear to God.
translation.es: Herpes de indigente. Existe, te lo juro.

translation.en: Did you see Dorsey's face?
That pastor of yours found a chapel downstairs.
translation.es: Tu pastor encontró una capilla abajo.

translation.en: Wants you to head down for some holy rolling with Jesus.
translation.es: Te espera para cantarle a Jesús.

translation.en: Seth. Enough.
Why'd you tell the police we bought Brenton that bike?
translation.es: ¿Por qué dijiste que le regalamos la bicicleta?

translation.en: You saw his face.
He already had his mind made up that he was in a gang.
translation.es: Ya estaba convencido de que era de una pandilla.

translation.en: Because of what? The bike?
Where'd he get it from?
What was he doing in that park?
I won't tolerate you covering up for him anymore.
translation.es: No voy a seguir tolerando que lo cubras.

translation.en: I know he'd been going back to the projects, and that park, after I explicitly told him not to go.
translation.es: Sé que volvió a las viviendas subsidiadas y al parque aunque se lo prohibí.

translation.en: 'Saiah, he misses his friends.
He misses his home.
That's not his home.
Not anymore.
I don't know where he got it.
translation.es: No sé de dónde la sacó.

translation.en: [Seth] You ought to go with him.
Go on, Tricey. I'll stay here with B.
translation.es: Ve, Trice. Yo me quedo con B.

translation.en: He's gonna suffocate Brenton with all of his worries.
translation.es: Va a sofocar a Brenton con sus preocupaciones.

translation.en: Just like he did you.
Kid must've been conscious for a while.
translation.es: El chico habrá estado consciente un rato.

translation.en: He's stuck between these two snowbanks here.
translation.es: Atascado entre estos dos bancos de nieve.

translation.en: Crawling around,
trying to find a way out, probably screaming for his mama.
translation.es: intentando salir, llamando a su mamá.

translation.en: Crime scene photos give you the heebie-jeebies?
I don't need to look at them.
Isn't that, like, your job? [clears throat]
Nope. My job is to file paperwork.
translation.es: No. Mi trabajo es presentar papeles.

translation.en: File paperwork? You could file paperwork at any fuck-face firm down on the water.
translation.es: ¿Presentar papeles? Eso podrías hacerlo en cualquier bufete de mierda.

translation.en: I'm sick of their eyes.
What?
Even when they're dead, it's...
They're looking at you, wanting answers.
You worked Homicide before?
How'd you get bumped to car crimes?
Car crimes. Heh... right.
Paralyzing a kid gets you three to five years, but it's guaranteed you won't do most of that time.
translation.es: Dejar a un chico paralítico, 3 a 5 años, pero seguro no se queda ni la mitad.

translation.en: It's the greatest show on Earth, this shit.
Did you see the driver's seat in Dorsey's car?
translation.es: ¿Viste el asiento de conductor de Dorsey?

translation.en: That narc cop said he had to chase him down,
translation.es: El de Narcóticos dijo que lo persiguió

translation.en: driving around outside the park, right? That's how they caught him.
So?
So, how do you drive lying down?
Here comes asshat. Finally.
-[man] Have a good night. -Whatever. Go fuck yourself.
Ah, okay.
I'm gonna write up the kid's belongings in the morning. [sniffs]
translation.es: Voy a reportar las cosas del chico a la mañana.

translation.en: -Okay. -You know, I can get an Uber from here.
But, yo, it was good working with you.
Yeah. You too.
And um...
Listen, the dead don't need answers.
translation.es: Escucha, los muertos no necesitan respuestas.

translation.en: They're dead. Okay?
See you at trial in the morning. Don't forget about those mints, huh?
translation.es: Nos vemos en la audiencia. Recuerda las mentas.

translation.en: Asshole.
Fuck!
[nurse] Excuse me.
Are you family?
I'm his attorney.
[clerk] Complaint number 39012, the State versus Mac Henry Dorsey.
translation.es: Querella número 39012, el Estado contra Mac Henry Dorsey.

translation.en: The counselor's appearance for the record.
translation.es: El abogado comparece para el registro.

translation.en: [judge] Is the State gonna talk?
Judge, it's not my complaint number.
translation.es: No es mi número de querella, Señoría.

translation.en: Then where the hell is my prosecutor?
[attorney] I'm sorry, Judge. I don't know.
translation.es: Lo siento, Señoría, no lo sé.

translation.en: Next case.
[clerk] Complaint number 39013, the State versus Lonny Mendoza.
translation.es: Número de demanda 39013, el Estado contra Lonny Mendoza.
